title: The Journey Begins
content: I started learning how to code! First with C++, then C# and finally moving onto HTML/CSS, Javascript and Ruby on Rails

title: Lighthouse Labs
content: At Lighthouse Labs I earned my Immersive Web Development Diploma as a first step in my development career

title: Food.ee
content: At Food.ee I got hands on experience developing an AngularJS app from scratch. I rebuilt the app without replacing the css or html just completely replacing the javascript

title: Dropcuff
content: Dropcuff is a startup of which I am working on, we're a team of 3 aiming to change the music industry as we know it

title: NRG eSports
content: At NRG I created a high availability backend with Elixir using Absinthe and Phoenix. I also helped frontside in Angular to implement features

title: Samacare
content: During my time at Samacare I archetected a backend application with Elixir and a frontend PWA with Angular

title: Self-Employed
content: With NRG eSports I became a contractor. I work out of my own company and take contracts that are interesting! Contact me if you have a project that needs working on
